content:
Day 1: Arrival in Dubai (April 22, 2023)
========================================

| Time | Activity | Cost | Working Time | Geocoordinates |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Morning | Check into a budget hotel | - | - | - |
| Late Morning | Ravi Restaurant (Brunch) | ~$10 | 24 hours | 25.245401, 55.275198 |
| Afternoon | Visit Al Seef District\* | Free | 24 hours | 25.260731, 55.297746 |
| Evening | Dubai Mall & Dubai Fountain\* | Free | Mall: 10am-12am, Fountain: 6pm-11pm | 25.197274, 55.279234 |
| Late Evening | Al Mallah (Dinner) | ~$8 | 7am-2am | 25.276497, 55.309686 |

Day 2: Dubai (April 23, 2023)
=============================

| Time | Activity | Cost | Working Time | Geocoordinates |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Morning | Jumeirah Beach\* | Free | 24 hours | 25.231768, 55.261291 |
| Mid-Morning | Karak House (Breakfast) | ~$10 | 7am-1am | 25.229095, 55.261578 |
| Afternoon | Visit the Mall of the Emirates | Free | 10am-12am | 25.118252, 55.200372 |
| Evening | Al Fahidi Historical Neighborhood\* | Free | 24 hours | 25.264225, 55.299586 |
| Late Evening | Al Fanar Restaurant (Dinner) | ~$20 | 8am-11pm | 25.227604, 55.277908 |

Day 3: Dubai (April 24, 2023)
=============================

| Time | Activity | Cost | Working Time | Geocoordinates |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Morning | Global Village (seasonal)\* | ~$5 | 4pm-12am | 25.072927, 55.308932 |
| Afternoon | Visit JBR, The Beach | Free | 24 hours | 25.081542, 55.134379 |
| Late Afternoon | Automatic Restaurant (Lunch) | ~$10 | 8am-1am | 25.082405, 55.139757 |
| Evening | Souk Madinat Jumeirah | Free | 10am-11pm | 25.133796, 55.183401 |
| Late Evening | Al Ibrahimi (Dinner) | ~$12 | 6am-12am | 25.137567, 55.188116 |

Day 4: Abu Dhabi (April 25, 2023)
=================================

| Time | Activity | Cost | Working Time | Geocoordinates |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Morning | Visit Sheikh Zayed Mosque\* | Free | 9am-10pm | 24.412521, 54.474735 |
| Late Morning | Bait El Khetyar (Brunch) | ~$12 |  |  |
